data.name: AskInstallVersion
data.value: It seems you do not have any version of Xenko currently installed. Would you like to install the latest version?
data.comment: Displayed when there is no installed version of Xenko

data.name: AskInstallVSIX
data.value: Would you like to install the latest version of the Visual Studio integration? This is highly recommended for programmers!
data.comment: Displayed after the AskInstallVersion message if VSIX is not installed

data.name: ButtonAnswers
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ButtonForums
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ButtonGithub
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ButtonDiscord
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ButtonIssues
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ButtonShowcase
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ConfirmUninstall
data.value: Are you sure you wish to uninstall version {0}?
data.comment: Displayed when the user attempt to delete a version

data.name: Details
data.comment: The word to display the detail of an error, plus a colon (:)

data.name: DownloadingReleaseNotes
data.comment: Displayed while downloading the release notes

data.name: ErrorDoNotFindVersion
data.value: Unable to find the version {0}. This project cannot be open.
data.comment: {0}: Version name

data.name: ErrorInstallingVersion
data.value: An error occurred while installing version {0}.
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the installation of a version failed. {0}: long version name

data.name: ErrorInstallingVSIX
data.value: An error occurred while installing Visual Studio plugin.
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the installation of the VSIX failed.

data.name: ErrorOfflineMode
data.value: Unable to connect to Xenko server. Switching to offline mode…
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the launcher is going to offline mode.

data.name: ErrorOpeningBrowser
data.value: An error occurred while trying to open a web browser
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the web browser could not be started

data.name: ErrorStartingProcess
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to start the program: {0}
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that a process failed to start. {0}: Error message

data.name: ErrorUninstallingVersion
data.value: An error occurred while uninstalling version {0}.
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the uninstallation of a version failed. {0}: long version name

data.name: ErrorUninstallingVSIX
data.value: An error occurred while uninstalling Visual Studio plugin.
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the uninstallation of the VSIX failed.

data.name: ErrorVersionBeingUpdated
data.value: The version {0} is being updated. Please wait a moment.
data.comment: {0}: Version name

data.name: ErrorVersionNotInstalled
data.value: The version {0} is not currently installed. Do you want to install it now?
data.comment: {0}: Version name

data.name: NewsDate
data.comment: Display the date of a news. {0}: a date

data.name: NoDocumentation
data.comment: Displayed when an error occurred while fetching the getting started pages

data.name: NoNews
data.comment: Displayed when an error occurred while fetching the news pages

data.name: NoReleaseNotes
data.comment: Displayed when an error occurred while fetching the release notes

data.name: NoVersionInstalled
data.comment: Displayed when no version of Xenko is currently installed

data.name: OpenProjectWithVersion
data.comment: {0}: short version name

data.name: ReportChecking
data.comment: Displayed when the VSIX status is being checked.

data.name: ReportDeletingVersion
data.comment: Displayed when a version is being deleted. {0}: long version name

data.name: ReportDiscovering
data.comment: Displayed when the version of a recent project is being discovered.

data.name: ReportDownloadingVersion
data.comment: Displayed when a version is being downloaded. {0}: long version name {1}: progression in percentage (0-100)

data.name: ReportDownloadingVSIX
data.comment: Displayed when the VSIX is being downloaded. {0}: progression in percentage (0-100)

data.name: ReportInstallingPrerequisites
data.comment: Displayed when the prerequisites of a version are being installed.

data.name: ReportInstallingVersion
data.comment: Displayed when a version is being installed. {0}: long version name

data.name: ReportInstallingVSIX
data.comment: Displayed when the VSIX is being installed.

data.name: ReportVSIXInstallForVersion
data.comment: Displayed when installing the VSIX for a specific version of Visual Studio. {0}: Visual Studio version name

data.name: SwitchOrUpdateVersion
data.comment: Title of this category

data.name: TabGettingStarted
data.comment: Title of this tab

data.name: TabNews
data.comment: Title of this tab

data.name: ToolTipDefault
data.comment: The default tooltip displayed in the status bar when nothing is highlighted

data.name: ToolTipDownload
data.comment: {0}: long version name

data.name: ToolTipOpenAndUpgradeProject
data.value: Open this project with a more recent version of Xenko (the project will be upgraded)
data.comment: The tooltip of the upgrade project button that can appear on any recently used project

data.name: ToolTipSetActiveVersion
data.comment: {0}: long version name

data.name: ToolTipStartButton
data.comment: {0}: long version name

data.name: ToolTipVisualStudioPlugin
data.comment: The tooltip of the Visual Studio Plugin button. {0}: A verb describing the action to do (Install, Reinstall, Update...)

data.name: UnknownVersion
data.comment: Unknown version

data.name: VersionButton
data.comment: Caption of the version selection button. {0}: short version name

data.name: VersionButtonUninstalled
data.comment: Additional message stating that the version is not currently installed. It is displayed right after the VersionButton text (with a space)

data.name: VersionButtonUpdateAvailable
data.comment: Additional message stating that an update is available for the version. It is displayed right after the VersionButton text (with a space)

data.name: VisualStudioPlugin
data.comment: Title of this category

data.name: VSIXInstallSucessful
data.value: Visual Studio plugin has been successfully installed. Please restart running instances of Visual Studio.
data.comment: Messagebox text indicating that the installation of the VSIX is successful

data.name: VSIXVerbInstall
data.comment: Verb used in a sentence to indicate that the VSIX can be installed.

data.name: VSIXVerbReinstall
data.comment: Verb used in a sentence to indicate that the VSIX can be reinstalled.

data.name: VSIXVerbUpdate
data.comment: Verb used in a sentence to indicate that the VSIX can be updated.

data.name: LauncherTitle
data.comment: Title of the launcher window

data.name: NoProjectCreated
data.comment: Message diplayed when the list of recent projects is empty

data.name: Projects
data.comment: Title of this category

data.name: SelfUpdateExit
data.comment: The cancel button of the self update window. Pressing it exit the application

data.name: SelfUpdateMessage
data.value: A new version of the launcher is being downloaded…
data.comment: Message of the self-update window

data.name: SelfUpdateTitle
data.comment: Title of the self-update window

data.name: AskSurvey
data.value: Help us improve Xenko! We are making an online survey that takes about 5 minutes to complete. Would you like to answer it?
data.comment: Displayed at startup one time

data.name: AutoCloseLauncher
data.value: Close the launcher after starting Xenko

data.name: ButtonRoadmap
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: ButtonSurvey
data.comment: /!\ Text must be short

data.name: InstallAlreadyInProgress
data.value: The installation of this version is already in progress. Please wait a moment.
data.comment: Displayed when trying to install a version that is already currently being installed

data.name: InstallLatestVersion
data.comment: Displayed when no version is installed

data.name: StartVersion
data.comment: {0}: long version name

data.name: ToolTipInstallLatestVersion
data.value: Install the latest available version of Xenko
data.comment: The tooltip of the button that will install the latest available version

data.name: ToolTipUninstall
data.comment: {0}: long version name

data.name: ToolTipUpdate
data.comment: {0}: long version name

data.name: VSIXInstallFailed
data.value: A problem has occurred during the installation of Visual Studio plugin. Check that you have at least one of the compatible version of Visual Studio installed (2012, 2013 or 2015).
data.comment: Messagebox text indicating that the installation of the VSIX has failed

data.name: ToggleHideBetaVersions
data.value: Click here to hide beta versions

data.name: ToggleShowBetaVersions
data.value: Click here to show beta versions

data.name: ErrorDevRedirect
data.value: An error occurred while trying to process a developer version: {0}
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that a dev version could not be processed

data.name: ShowInExplorer
data.comment: Menu item of recent files list

data.name: RemoveFromList
data.comment: Menu item of recent files list

data.name: ToolTipOpenLink
data.comment: The tooltip for website links.
